title: Complete Dutch License Categories
content: AM (moped): 16+ years, max 25km/h, no gear required. A1 (light motorcycle): 18+ years, max 11kW, 125cc. A2 (medium motorcycle): 20+ years, max 35kW. A (heavy motorcycle): 24+ years (21 with A2 experience), unlimited power. B (car): 18+ years, max 3500kg, max 8 passengers. BE (car+trailer): 18+ years, requires B license. C1 (small truck): 18+ years, 3500-7500kg. C (truck): 21+ years, unlimited weight. D (bus): 24+ years, passenger transport.

title: Medical Requirements for Dutch Driving License
content: Standard health declaration required for all applicants. Medical examination mandatory for: drivers over 75 years, certain medical conditions (diabetes, epilepsy, heart conditions), professional drivers (C, D categories). Eye test requirements: visual acuity 0.5 (both eyes), 0.6 (better eye). Color blindness not automatically disqualifying. Hearing requirements only for professional categories.

title: International License Exchange Netherlands
content: EU/EEA licenses: exchange not required, valid until expiry. Non-EU countries with exchange agreement: USA (some states), Australia, Canada, Japan, South Korea, Switzerland. Exchange period: 185 days from becoming Dutch resident. Required documents: foreign license, translation (if not English/German/French), proof of residency, health declaration. Exchange fee: â‚¬43.50.
